description.zh-CN: 驱动平台基础，为其他驱动提供运行时修补功能
description.zh-TW: 驅動平台基礎，為其他驅動提供運行時修補功能
description.zh-HK: 驅動平台基礎，為其他驅動提供運行時修補功能
description.ja: An オープンソース カーネル拡張 bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the システム for macOS.
description.ko: An 오픈 소스 커널 확장 bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the 시스템 for macOS.
description.es: An código abierto extensión del kernel bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the sistema for macOS.
description.fr: An open source extension du noyau bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the système for macOS.
description.de: An Open Source Kernel-Erweiterung bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the System for macOS.
description.ru: An открытый исходный код расширение ядра bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the система for macOS.
description.en: An open source kernel extension bringing a platform for arbitrary kext, library, and program patching throughout the system for macOS.

version.changelog:
#### v1.7.1
- Allow loading on macOS 26 without `-lilubetaall`, thanks @AlfCraft07

notes.ja: Essential driver for all Hackintosh systems
notes.de: Essential driver for all Hackintosh systems
notes.ru: Essential driver for all Hackintosh systems
